decision_conditions: Condition 3 requires that no development takes place until samples of all external facing materials have been submitted to and approved by the local planning authority in writing. No samples have been submitted to the Council. Additionally the schedule of materials on the submitted plans differ from that stated within the application form. As such insufficient information has been submitted and the proposal is thus contrary to Policy DMHB 11 of the Hillingdon Local Plan: Part Two - Development Management Policies (January 2020).
description: Details pursuant to conditions 3 (Materials) and 4 (Landscape) of Secretary of State's Appeal Decision ref: APP/R5510/W/17/3167771 dated 04/07/2017 (LBH ref: 54964/APP/2016/1378  dated ) -  Two-storey detached dwelling house involving demolition of existing garage outbuilding
